{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3129188,"name":"icemannie","username":"icemannie","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/i/bc79bd/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-01-18T20:41:16.969Z","cooked":"

I’ve been working on interfacing with LimeLight V3 2023_0_1 .

GitHub

GitHub - fondyfire2194/LimeLightV3Example: Example including new LimeLight...

Example including new LimeLight classes. Contribute to fondyfire2194/LimeLightV3Example development by creating an account on GitHub.

Example reads and writes from / to a camera named limelight-tags. Shuffleboard screen included.
Basic Commands included in LimeLight class for LEDs, Pipeline changes etc.
If you are interested, please try it and let me know comments or questions.
